onPostMessageServiceConnected().Description: Called when the @B_android#support#customtabs#PostMessageService_E@ connection is established.

Returns: Whether the notification was sent to the remote successfully.
notifyMessageChannelReady(android.os.Bun.Description: Notifies the client that the postMessage channel requested with @B_android#support#customtabs#CustomTabsService#requestPostMessageChannel_E@ is ready. This method should be called when the browser binds to the client side @B_android#support#customtabs#PostMessageService_E@ and also readies a connection to the web frame.

Parameters: Context: The context to be unbound from.
unbindFromContext(android.content.Contex.Description: Unbinds this service connection from the given context.

Returns: Whether the postMessage was sent to the remote successfully.
postMessage(java.lang.String, android.os.Description: Posts a message to the client. This should be called when a tab controlled by related @B_android#support#customtabs#CustomTabsSession_E@ has sent a postMessage. If postMessage() is called from a single thread, then the messages will be posted in the same order.

onPostMessageServiceDisconnected().Description: Called when the connection is lost with the @B_android#support#customtabs#PostMessageService_E@.

ClassDesc: A https:##developer#android#com@B_android#content#ServiceConnection_E@ for Custom Tabs providers to use while connecting to a @B_android#support#customtabs#PostMessageService_E@ on the client side.
